mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user ( user_id, password, nickname, age, gender, path, token, img, stamps ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{path}, #{token}, #{img}, #{stamps} )
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, password, nickname, age, gender, path, token, img, stamps FROM t_user WHERE user_id = #{userId}
SELECT user_id, password, nickname, age, gender, path, token, img, stamps FROM t_user WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND password = #{password}
